title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 31
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 31
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Yelena Shulyatyeva Senior US Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Apple sheds `curse of the Dow,' leads average's gain."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
